Verses: 1 (neginoththennum Vaaththiyaththil Vaasikka Raagaththalaivanukku Oppuvikkappatta Thaaveedhin Sangeedham.) En Needhiyin Dhevane, Naan Kooppidugaiyil Enakku Sevikodum; Nerukkaththil Irundha Enakku Visaalamundaakkineer; Enakku Irangi, En Vinnappaththaik Kettarulum.
2 manubuththirare, Edhuvaraikkum En Magimaiyai Avamaanappaduththi, Veenaanadhai Virumbi, Poiyai Naaduveergal. (selaa.)
3 bakthiyullavanaik Karththar Thamakkaagath Therindhukondaarendru Ariyungal; Naan Karththarai Nokkik Kooppidugaiyil Avar Ketpaar.
4 neengal Kobankondaalum, Paavanseyyaadhirungal; Ungal Padukkaiyile Ungal Irudhayaththil Pesikkondu Amarndhirungal. (selaa.)
6 engalukku Nanmai Kaanpippavan Yaar Endru Sollugiravargal Anegar; Karththaave, Ummudaiya Mugaththin Oliyai Engalmel Piragaasikkappannum.
7 avargalukkuth Thaaniyamum Thiraatcharasamum Perugiyirukkirakaalaththin Sandhoshaththaippaarkkilum, Adhiga Sandhoshaththai En Irudhayaththil Thandheer.
8 samaadhaanaththode Paduththukkondu Niththiraiseyven; Karththaave, Neer Oruvare Ennai Sugamaaith Thangappannugireer.
